messages.content: I remember going to see the fireworks with my best friend. It was the first time we ever spent time alone together. Although there was a lot of people, we felt like the only people in the world.
Was this a friend you were in love with, or just a best friend?
This was a best friend. I miss her.
Oh was this something that happened because of an argument?
